title: Dr. Theresa Wildgrube
author: unknown
text: Theresa Wildgrube is Head of Programme Carbon Markets & Pricing in the Carbon Markets and Pricing programme and in the Secretariat of the International Carbon Action Partnership (ICAP). She is primarily concerned with how emissions trading systems work, because she is convinced that carbon markets are a cornerstone of international climate policy, and can help achieve climate neutrality. “Carbon markets not only provide incentives for efficient decarbonisation, they also enable countries to work together on climate policy. With my work I can push these processes forward.”
